name: Ragdoll Randy
description: Ragdoll Randy is a physics game I created for the Playmaker game jam. Although the main  protagonist isn't as supernatural as your average villain he still manages to cause a lot of trouble.   In this game you're on a mission to get everyone hooked on alcohol for the wrong reasons. If you fail the first time you may just be a bit more convincing the second time. I wont spoil a thing.
